amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to change the definition of land eligible for a tribe's jurisdiction to include all land within any Alaska Native village, for the Alaska tribal jurisdiction pilot project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Young.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
